svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 21, 2023" date: "2023-01-21"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
* Withdrawals FAQ
Withdrawals FAQ
* Latest core devs execution call video . Summary by Tim Beiko. Notes from Tim Beiko
& Christine Kim : withdrawal-devnet-3 tested EL & CL both using gwei units for
withdrawals Sepolia shadow fork went smoothly Mainnet shadow fork next week Withdrawal
root in Execution Layer will remain RLP encoded (CL is SSZ) EIP6049 (deprecation
notice for SELFDESTRUCT) added to Shanghai EOF EIPs added as candidates for inclusion
in Cancun upgrade Eth Magicians to be used for community input on scope of future
upgrades
Latest core devs execution call video . Summary by Tim Beiko. Notes from Tim Beiko &
Christine Kim :
* withdrawal-devnet-3 tested EL & CL both using gwei units for withdrawals
withdrawal-devnet-3 tested EL & CL both using gwei units for withdrawals
* Sepolia shadow fork went smoothly
Sepolia shadow fork went smoothly
* Mainnet shadow fork next week
Mainnet shadow fork next week
* Withdrawal root in Execution Layer will remain RLP encoded (CL is SSZ)
Withdrawal root in Execution Layer will remain RLP encoded (CL is SSZ)
* EIP6049 (deprecation notice for SELFDESTRUCT) added to Shanghai
EIP6049 (deprecation notice for SELFDESTRUCT) added to Shanghai
* EOF EIPs added as candidates for inclusion in Cancun upgrade
EOF EIPs added as candidates for inclusion in Cancun upgrade
* Eth Magicians to be used for community input on scope of future upgrades
Eth Magicians to be used for community input on scope of future upgrades
* withdrawal-devnet-2 retired : tx-fuzz found issues with EthereumJS sometimes
producing bad blocks and Geth txpool not rejecting bad transactions
withdrawal-devnet-2 retired : tx-fuzz found issues with EthereumJS sometimes producing
bad blocks and Geth txpool not rejecting bad transactions
* Zhejiang public testnet for Shapella upgrade expected after the client interop next
week
Zhejiang public testnet for Shapella upgrade expected after the client interop next
* Shapella community call video
Shapella community call video
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Community discussion on Cancun upgrade scope
Community discussion on Cancun upgrade scope
* Latest EIP4844 implementers call video . Notes from Terence : devnet 4 expected next
Latest EIP4844 implementers call video . Notes from Terence : devnet 4 expected next
* KZG Ceremony: 12,000+ contributions in first week, average contribution taking 50
seconds EF ceremony announcement
KZG Ceremony:
* 12,000+ contributions in first week, average contribution taking 50 seconds
12,000+ contributions in first week, average contribution taking 50 seconds
* EF ceremony announcement
EF ceremony announcement
Layer 1
* Ethereum Cat Herders client diversity survey for node runners
Ethereum Cat Herders client diversity survey for node runners
* Patrick McCorry’s Proof of Stake explainer series
Patrick McCorry’s Proof of Stake explainer series
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.1.0 : on-the-fly database pruning, 60-70 GB storage for
typical beacon node
Consensus layer:
* Nimbus v23.1.0 : on-the-fly database pruning, 60-70 GB storage for typical beacon
node
* Execution layer: Erigon v2.36.0 : block body downloader fix and MDBX upgrade rolled
back
Execution layer:
* Erigon v2.36.0 : block body downloader fix and MDBX upgrade rolled back
Research
* Proofs of complete knowledge (CK) : prevent encumbrance of secrets using TEEs &
mining ASICs
Proofs of complete knowledge (CK) : prevent encumbrance of secrets using TEEs & mining
ASICs
* Note on fast amortized KZG proofs
Note on fast amortized KZG proofs
* Gradual Dutch Auctions [PDF] can be modified to be incentive compatible
Gradual Dutch Auctions [PDF] can be modified to be incentive compatible
EIPs/Standards
* ERC6299 : Lockable tokens
ERC6299 : Lockable tokens
* ERC6315 : ERC2771 Account Abstraction
ERC6315 : ERC2771 Account Abstraction
* ERC6327 : Elastic signature
ERC6327 : Elastic signature
* ERC6353 : Charity token
ERC6353 : Charity token
* ERC6357 : Single-contract Multicall
ERC6357 : Single-contract Multicall
* ERC6358 : Omniverse DLT
ERC6358 : Omniverse DLT
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Mimic !
Does your app or DAO want to automate your DeFi operations? With Mimic, you can
automate swapping, bridging and treasury management .
Check out our Smart Vaults to automate DeFi operations in a secure, trustless, and
non-custodial way.
We’ll be at EthDenver if you want to request a demo IRL. Backed by Starbloom Ventures.
Stuff for developers
* Foundry: Foundry best practices forge-std v1.3.0 : InvariantTest helper contract,
Multicall3 interface & getTokenBalances helper, StdChains chain alias, parseJson &
assumePayable cheat codes and decimal assertions Invariant testing: example repo to
experiment, also see Maple Finance invariant tests forge doc : documentation generator
using natspec, outputs markdown
Foundry:
* Foundry best practices
Foundry best practices
* forge-std v1.3.0 : InvariantTest helper contract, Multicall3 interface &
getTokenBalances helper, StdChains chain alias, parseJson & assumePayable cheat codes
and decimal assertions
forge-std v1.3.0 : InvariantTest helper contract, Multicall3 interface &
* Invariant testing: example repo to experiment, also see Maple Finance invariant
tests
Invariant testing: example repo to experiment, also see Maple Finance invariant tests
* forge doc : documentation generator using natspec, outputs markdown
forge doc : documentation generator using natspec, outputs markdown
* Solidity preview of user-defined operators in upcoming v0.8.18
Solidity preview of user-defined operators in upcoming v0.8.18
* Fe language bountiful round 2 bug bounty contest
Fe language bountiful round 2 bug bounty contest
* Beginners guide to Yul (intermediate language)
Beginners guide to Yul (intermediate language)
* Guide to contract decompilation , as implemented by heimdall-rs (decompiler)
Guide to contract decompilation , as implemented by heimdall-rs (decompiler)
* Solidity-merkle-trees : Solidity library to verify multi-proofs of Merkle trees
Solidity-merkle-trees : Solidity library to verify multi-proofs of Merkle trees
* ERC5267 demo website to retrieve ERC712 domain
ERC5267 demo website to retrieve ERC712 domain
* The Graph adds support for Arbitrum & Optimism
The Graph adds support for Arbitrum & Optimism
Security
* Echidna v2.0.5 (contract fuzzer): adds prank to override msg.sender for next
external call
Echidna v2.0.5 (contract fuzzer): adds prank to override msg.sender for next external
call
* Read-only reentrancy explainer
Read-only reentrancy explainer
Ecosystem
* Tim Beiko: how Ethereum has staking rewards & deflation as Ether goes ultrasound
again
Tim Beiko: how Ethereum has staking rewards & deflation as Ether goes ultrasound
* Ethereum has 500,000 validators
Ethereum has 500,000 validators
* Vitalik: guide to stealth addresses
Vitalik: guide to stealth addresses
* Wallet devs call video and summary
Wallet devs call video and summary
* Ethereum Foundation second academic grants round
Ethereum Foundation second academic grants round
* Mergooor Pass : non-transferrable NFT for Merge contributors to access major events
Mergooor Pass : non-transferrable NFT for Merge contributors to access major events
Enterprise
* Nightfall v3 considered production beta
Nightfall v3 considered production beta
* Second Australian bank creating AUD stablecoin
Second Australian bank creating AUD stablecoin
* Enterprise Ethereum Alliance QBFT spec , evolution of Istanbul BFT, formally
verified
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance QBFT spec , evolution of Istanbul BFT, formally verified
Application layer
* Uniswap Permit2 live , token approvals expire every 30 days, sign to reauthorize
Uniswap Permit2 live , token approvals expire every 30 days, sign to reauthorize
* Maker vote to remove Gemini USD stable coin defeated at last minute, Paxos offering
45% of the US federal funds rate
Maker vote to remove Gemini USD stable coin defeated at last minute, Paxos offering
* MACI (anti-collusion) v1.1.1 : adds granting users more votes without
re-registering, reduce match amounts where contributions are highly correlated and
sample coordinator service
MACI (anti-collusion) v1.1.1 : adds granting users more votes without re-registering,
reduce match amounts where contributions are highly correlated and sample coordinator
service
* Proof of Innocence : prove deposits to Tornado Cash are not from sanctioned
addresses
Proof of Innocence : prove deposits to Tornado Cash are not from sanctioned addresses
* Unlock Protocol’s guide to NFT ticketing for events
Unlock Protocol’s guide to NFT ticketing for events
* Introduction to zero-knowledge apps
Introduction to zero-knowledge apps
* ETH dust collector : sweep dust from an address using legacy Type 0 transactions
ETH dust collector : sweep dust from an address using legacy Type 0 transactions
Job Listings
* Ethereum Foundation are hiring a Community Lead for ethereum.org
Ethereum Foundation are hiring a Community Lead for ethereum.org
* Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
Lighthouse seeking support tech to help its stakers
* Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
Status is hiring a Technical Writer for Waku Product , all other jobs here
* Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
Arx, creators of KONG Cash and HaLo tags is hiring a Solidity developer .
* Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* CeFi lending platform Genesis filed for bankruptcy
CeFi lending platform Genesis filed for bankruptcy
* Nexo $45 million settlement with US SEC & states for failing to register retail
lending product
Nexo $45 million settlement with US SEC & states for failing to register retail
* BitConnect fraud victims to share $17 million in restitution
BitConnect fraud victims to share $17 million in restitution
* US DoJ pre-announced enforcement action, ended up being arrest of Russian owner of
Bitzlato exchange
US DoJ pre-announced enforcement action, ended up being arrest of Russian owner of
* ConsenSys laying off ~100 employees
ConsenSys laying off ~100 employees
* Coinbase halting operations in Japan
Coinbase halting operations in Japan
* Uniswap: on-chain foreign exchange could reduce remittance cost by up to 80%
Uniswap: on-chain foreign exchange could reduce remittance cost by up to 80%
General/crypto
* zkalc : calculate time to perform cryptographic operations on selected computers
zkalc : calculate time to perform cryptographic operations on selected computers
* zk system benchmarking : standard benchmarks for comparing zk proof library
performance
zk system benchmarking : standard benchmarks for comparing zk proof library
* Halo2 FRI gadget : FRI verifier circuit for BN254 scalar field
Halo2 FRI gadget : FRI verifier circuit for BN254 scalar field
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-january-21-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jan 31 – deadline for Gitcoin grants round
Jan 31 – deadline for Gitcoin grants round
* Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants deadline
* Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
Jan 31 – deadline to nominate for Optimism retroactive public goods round 2
* Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
Feb 3 – deadline to nominate for DAOdrops retroactive public goods funding
* Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
Feb 24 - Mar 1 – ETHDenver BUIDLWeek
* Feb 27 – deadline for EF academic grants round
Feb 27 – deadline for EF academic grants round
* Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver Hackathon
* Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
Mar 10-29 – Scaling Ethereum (ETHGlobal) virtual
* Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
* Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
Mar 16-18 – ETH Porto
* Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
Mar 28-30 – Ethereum Rio
* Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
* Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
* Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
Apr 14-16 – ETHGlobal Tokyo
* Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
Apr 14-16 – ETHZurich conference
* Apr 21-23 – EthTaipei hackathon
Apr 21-23 – EthTaipei hackathon
* Apr 24-25 – EthTaipei conference
Apr 24-25 – EthTaipei conference
* May 5-7 – ETHMalaysia conference & hackathon
May 5-7 – ETHMalaysia conference & hackathon
* May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
May 26–28 – ETHGlobal Istanbul
* Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
Jun 23–25 – ETHGlobal Toronto
* Jul 5-7 – ETHBarcelona
Jul 5-7 – ETHBarcelona
* Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
Jul 17-20 – EthCC (Paris)
* Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
Jul 21–23 – ETHGlobal Paris
* Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
Sep 22–24 – ETHGlobal New York
* Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Oct 6–25 – ETHOnline (ETHGlobal) virtual
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
Week in Ethereum News
